death.attack.pulsarBeam: %s was fried by a high-powered pulsar beam
death.attack.pulsarBeam.player: %s was hit into a high-powered pulsar beam by %s
spell.starbound.phase.desc: Instantly warps you to a distant location.
spell.starbound.magnet.desc: Pulls nearby items or entities toward you.
spell.starbound.death_ray.desc: Fires a focused beam of destructive energy.
spell.starbound.water.desc: Summons a surge of cleansing and forceful water.
spell.starbound.light_beam.desc: Shoots a dazzling beam of radiant light.
spell.starbound.fire.desc: Unleashes a deadly vortex of flame and fire.
spell.starbound.possess.desc: Temporarily control the body of another being.
spell.starbound.time_control.desc: Bend the flow of time to your will.
spell.starbound.dummy.desc: Conjures a decoy to distract foes.
spell.starbound.confetti.desc: A burst of colorful fun with unexpected effects!
spell.starbound.sonic.desc: Shatters the air with a powerful sonic wave.
spell.starbound.lightning.desc: Calls down a bolt of raw electrical power.
spell.starbound.float.desc: Lighten your body and drift gently above ground.
spell.starbound.earthquake.desc: Shake the very earth beneath your foes.
spell.starbound.void_rift.desc: Tear a hole into the void to pull in matter.
spell.starbound.shield.desc: Create a magical barrier to block damage.
spell.starbound.plant_grow.desc: Accelerate the growth of natural life.
spell.starbound.levitation.desc: Float freely upward into the air.
spell.starbound.transmutation.desc: Alter the properties of matter itself.
